enduranceSupport01.name: BCAA 1000
productOverview: Branched Chain Amino Acid Support.

BCAA 1000 Caps are recommended first thing in the morning and/or during the 30 minutes just before or immediately after training. Simply take 2 capsules with your favourite beverage, or with your protein shake.
benefits: Support your active lifestyle by supplementing with ON BCAA capsules
ON’s BCAA 1000 Caps deliver 1000 mg of BCAAs per 2- capsule serving in a 2:1:1 ratio of Leucine to Isoleucine and Valine
Use between meals, before training, or after finishing your workout to augment your daily intake of amino acids
Easy to swallow capsules
Available in 60CT, 200CT, 400CT
enduranceSupport01.suggestedUse: BCAA 1000 Caps are recommended first thing in the morning and/or during the 30 minutes just before or immediately after training. Simply take 2 capsules with your favourite beverage, or with your protein shake.

enduranceSupport02.name: GLUTAMINE POWDER
productOverview: Glutamine is the most abundant amino acid in the body, comprising more than 60% of the free amino acid pool in skeletal muscle and greater than 20% of total circulating amino acids. During prolonged, intense exercise, muscle glutamine levels may be depleted, and this can limit protein synthesis.¹ Glutamine Powder is an easy way to supplement your diet. This instantized powder mixes easily and is unflavored for 'stacking' with protein shakes.
benefits: 5 Grams of Pure L-Glutamine Per Serving
Most Abundant Amino Acid in the Body
Mixes Easily
Highly Concentrated
enduranceSupport02.suggestedUse: Mix one heaping teaspoon of Glutamine Powder with 8 fluid ounces of water or your favorite beverage as part of a healthy diet and exercise plan. Intended for use in healthy adults as part of a healthy, balanced diet and exercise program.

enduranceSupport03.name: BCAA 5000
productOverview: Muscle Endurance & Recovery

ON’s BCAA 5000 Powder delivers five grams of BCAAs per serving in the preferred 2:1:1 ratio of leucine to isoleucine and valine. It’s instantized for easy mixing into water, juice or post-workout shakes. Mix the unflavored powder into any type of shake and enjoy!
benefits: 5 grams of high quality BCAAs in 2:1:1 Ratio
Intra-workout support to help spare muscle during endurance exercise
BCAAs have long been used by strength and endurance athletes in combination with intense training for muscle support and recovery
enduranceSupport03.suggestedUse: Mix 2 scoops of the powder into 10-12 ounces of cold water or your favorite beverage. Use post-workout and/or between meals to add additional BCAAs to your healthy, balanced diet.

muscleBuild01.name: MICRONIZED CREATINE CAPSULES
productOverview: Supports Muscle Building, Strength & Performance

Creatine monohydrate has been extensively studied and shown to help support muscle size, strength and power when used consistently over time in conjunction with a healthy, balanced diet and regular weight training
benefits: 100% Pure Creatine Monohydrate
2.5 Grams of Creatine Monohydrate per 2-Capsule Serving
muscleBuild01.suggestedUse: Consume 2 capsules with a meal. Intended for use in healthy adults as part of a healthy, balanced diet and exercise program.

muscleBuild02.name: MICRONIZED CREATINE POWDER
productOverview: Muscle Size, Strength & Performance

Creatine monohydrate has been extensively studied and shown to help support muscle size, strength and recovery when used consistently over time in conjunction with a healthy, balanced diet and regular weight training.
benefits: 100% Pure Creatine Monohydrate
5 Grams of Pure Creatine Monohydrate per Serving
Helps Support ATP Recycling & Explosive Movements
Micronized for easy mixing
Banned Substance Tested
muscleBuild02.suggestedUse: Mix one rounded teaspoon of the Micronized Creatine powder into a protein shake or glass of your favorite flavored beverage. Then mix with a spoon. Intended for use in healthy adults and as part of a healthy, balanced diet and exercise program.

preWorkout01.name: GOLD STANDARD PRE ADVANCED
productOverview: For Intense Energy, Performance & Endurance

GOLD STANDARD PRE-WORKOUT ADVANCED is an intense, dialed up version of our core pre-workout powder. It’s designed to help you unleash intense energy, pumps and performance so you can reach the pinnacle of your game and crush your next set.
benefits: 300 mg of Caffeine from Natural Sources Per Serving
6 Grams of L-Citrulline Per Serving
3.2 Grams of Beta-Alanine Per Serving
5 Grams of Creatine Monohydrate per Serving
650 mg Electrolyte Blend for Hydration Support (when taken with at least 10 fluid ounces of water)
222% of the Daily Value for Vitamin C per Serving
preWorkout01.suggestedUse: Mix 1 scoop of the powder into 6 to 8 fluid ounces of cold water 15 to 30 minutes before exercise.

preWorkout02.name: BETA-ALANINE POWDER
productOverview: Muscle Endurance

Two scoops of OPTIMUM NUTRITION Beta-Alanine Powder provides 3.2 grams of Beta-Alanine. Stack the unflavored version with shakes and other powders, or mix up the flavored version in cold water. Beta-Alanine supports muscle buffering systems to help delay the onset of muscle fatigue helping you train harder for longer.
benefits: Supports Muscular Endurance
Supports training harder, longer
3.2 Grams Beta-Alanine per Serving
preWorkout02.suggestedUse: Add 2 scoops to a glass or shaker cup filled with 12-16 fluid ounces of cold water or your favorite beverage. Mix or shake thoroughly for 15-20 seconds or until powder is completely dissolved. Intended for use in healthy adults as part of a healthy, balanced diet and exercise program.

protein01.name: OPTIMUM NUTRITION GOLD STANDARD 100% WHEY PROTEIN
productOverview: Post-Workout Muscle Support & Recovery

Each serving of the world’s best-selling whey protein powder provides 24 grams of high-quality whey protein primarily from Whey Protein Isolate, which has had excess carbohydrates, fat, and lactose ‘isolated’ out using sophisticated filtering technologies. The powder is also instantized for easy mixing using just a glass and spoon. With more than 20 different flavors – including naturally flavored options – there’s no doubt this is the Optimum Nutrition Gold Standard 100% Whey Protein.
benefits: The World's Best-Selling Whey Protein Powder
24 Grams of Protein per Serving to Help Build and Maintain Muscle
5.5 Grams of Naturally Occurring BCAAs per Serving to Support Endurance and Recovery
Gluten Free
Banned Substance Tested
protein01.suggestedUse: Mix about one scoop of the powder into 6 to 8 fluid ounces of cold water, milk or other beverage. Stir, shake or blend until dissolved. For best results, mix up your shake 30 to 60 minutes after your workout or use as an anytime snack in your balanced diet.

protein02.name: NATURALLY FLAVORED GOLD STANDARD 100% CASEIN
productOverview: Slow-Digesting Protein for Overnight Muscle Recovery

Casein, a slower digesting and absorbing protein, compared to whey, may be used after exercise, between meals, or before bed to help support satiety and muscle recovery. GOLD STANDARD 100% CASEIN™ can deliver BCAAs to recovering muscles for several hours. By using only premium micellar casein with our high standards —and no artificial flavors, sweeteners or colors— as a protein source, we’ve created a protein powder that sets the GOLD STANDARD® for slow digesting protein support.
benefits: 24 Grams of Protein Per Serving Helps Build & Maintain Muscle
4.9 Grams of Naturally Occurring BCAAs to Support Recovery
4.8 Grams of Naturally Occurring Glutamic Acid
Ideal for Use Between Meals or Before Bed
No Artificial Flavors, Sweeteners or Colors
Banned Substance Tested
40% of the Daily Value for Calcium
130 Calories per Serving
0.5 - 1 Gram of Fat Per Serving
protein02.suggestedUse: Mix a scoop of the powder into 8 to 14 fluid ounces of cold water or milk using a shaker cup. For best results, mix up your shake 30 to 60 minutes after your workout, before bed, or use as an anytime snack.

protein03.name: GOLD STANDARD 100% ISOLATE
productOverview: High Quality Hydrolyzed & Ultra-Filtered Whey Protein Isolate

To create GOLD STANDARD 100% ISOLATE, we start by selecting only the highest quality whey protein which undergoes a series of sophisticated filtration processes to ‘isolate’ out excess fat, cholesterol and sugar. A portion of this Whey Protein Isolate is then hydrolyzed – broken down into smaller chains of amino acids. The final product is a fast digesting complete protein containing no more than 1 gram of carbohydrates, less than a gram of fat and more than 80% pure protein per Serving.
benefits: 25 Grams of Protein Per Serving
5.5 Grams of Naturally Occurring BCAAs per Serving
1 Gram of Carbohydrates Per Serving
11.4 Grams of Naturally Occurring Essential Amino Acids per Serving
4.3 Grams of Naturally Occurring Glutamine & Glutamic Acid per Serving
Approximately 80% Pure Protein per Serving
Delicious Taste in 6 to 8 Fluid Ounces of Cold Water
Gluten Free
Banned Substance Tested
protein03.suggestedUse: Mix about one scoop of the powder into 6 to 8 fluid ounces of cold water or milk and stir, shake or blend for 30 second until dissolved. For best results, mix your shake 30 to 60 minutes after your workout or use as an anytime snack. For healthy adults, consume enough protein to meet your daily protein requirements with a combination of high protein foods and protein supplementation throughout the day as part of a balanced, diet and exercise program.

protein04.name: PLATINUM HYDROWHEY
productOverview: Hydrolyzed, Quick Digesting

Platinum HYDROWHEY is the most advanced whey protein we’ve ever developed containing 100% Hydrolyzed Whey Protein Isolate. Hydrolyzed Whey Protein Isolate has much of the carbohydrates, fat and lactose ‘isolated’ out using sophisticated filtering technologies, and hydrolyzing breaks larger proteins down into smaller pieces, so ultra-pure whey isolate is able to get into your system rapidly for muscle recovery support. Finally, we dialed up this ultra-pure and rapidly digesting formula with added micronized Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs).
benefits: Made Exclusively With Hydrolyzed Whey Protein Isolate
30 Grams of Protein Per Serving
8.8 Grams of Naturally Occurring and Added Leucine, Isoleucine & Valine (BCAAs) per Serving
Instantized to Mix Easily Using a Glass & Spoon
Gluten Free
Banned Substance Tested
protein04.suggestedUse: Mix about one scoop of the powder into 10 to 12 fluid ounces of cold water or milk using a blender, shaker cup or glass and blend, shake or stir for 20-30 seconds or until powder is dissolved. For best results, mix up your shake 30 to 60 minutes after your workout or use as an anytime snack.

protein05.name: GOLD STANDARD 100% PLANT
productOverview: Organic, Plant-Based Protein

GOLD STANDARD 100% PLANT was made for active adults who care about what they eat and where their nutrients come from. Combining organic pea, brown rice and sacha inchi proteins, provides a complete profile of Essential Amino Acids to support muscle recovery. Along with 24 grams of protein, each serving delivers 100% of the Daily Value for vitamin C, is an excellent source of vitamin B12, and includes a gluten free complex of ancient grains and pomegranate powder. This USDA Certified Organic, non-GMO formula is free of artificial flavors, sweeteners and colors.
benefits: 24 Grams of Plant Protein per Serving to Help Build and Maintain Muscle
4 Grams of Naturally Occurring BCAAs per Serving to Support Endurance and Recovery
No Artificial Flavors, Sweeteners or Colors
Complete Profile of Essential Amino Acids
Non-GMO & USDA Certified Organic
Gluten, Dairy & Soy Free
protein05.suggestedUse: Mix about one scoop of powder with 8 to 10 fluid ounces of cold water or almond milk in a shaker or blender. For best results, mix up your shake 30 to 60 minutes after your workout or use as an anytime snack in your balanced diet. For healthy adults, consume enough protein to meet your daily protein requirements with a combination of high protein foods and protein supplements throughout the day as part of a balanced diet and exercise program.

snack01.name: CAKE BITES
productOverview: Deliciously Whipped Snack for Muscle Recovery Support

CAKE BITES are a deliciously whipped snack with rich frosted coating offers the ideal combination of muscle supporting protein, taste and convenience. Any day can feel like a cheat day with these individually wrapped 3-cake servings.
benefits: Gluten Free
Grab & Go Convenience
20-25% of the Daily Value for Calcium per Serving
snack01.suggestedUse: Take along on busy days as an anytime snack in your balanced diet.

snack02.name: PROTEIN WAFERS
productOverview: Light & Airy Snack for Post-Workout Muscle Recovery
Protein Wafers raise the bar for ready to eat protein convenience. Each 2-wafer serving delivers 11-15 grams of protein as a deliciously light and airy treat to help you hit your macro goals.
benefits: Eat One Wafer Now, Save the Other for Later
Grab & Go Convenience
snack02.suggestedUse: Take along on busy days as an anytime snack in your balanced diet.

snack03.name: PROTEIN CRISP
productOverview: Deliciously Crunchy Protein Snack for Muscle Recovery Support
PROTEIN CRISP Bars are a crunchy alternative to chewy protein bars. With great taste and grab-and-go convenience, this anytime snack represents a delicious new way for active adults to get protein.
benefits: Light Crispy Texture
Fewer than 4 Grams of Sugar per Serving
10% of the Daily Value for Calcium
snack03.suggestedUse: Take along on busy days as an anytime snack in your balanced diet.

vitamins01.name: OPTI-MEN
productOverview: Multi-Vitamin for Active Men

OPTI-MEN® is more than a multi. It’s a NUTRIENT OPTIMIZATION SYSTEM OPTI-MEN® providing 75+ active ingredients in 4 blends specifically designed to support the nutrient needs of active men. Each 3-tablet serving provides free form amino acids, antioxidant vitamins A, C and E, essential minerals and botanical extracts in foundational amounts that can be built on by consuming a healthy, balanced diet.
benefits: 21 Vitamins & Minerals
75 Active Ingredients
275+ mg of B Complex Vitamins per 3-tablet serving
1 Gram of Free-Form Amino Acids per 3-tablet serving
18 Fruit & Vegetable Concentrates
7 Exotic Botanicals & Marine Extracts
vitamins01.suggestedUse: Consume 3 tablets with food. Intended for use in healthy adults as part of a healthy, balanced diet and exercise program.

vitamins02.name: OPTI-MEN MULTI + PROBIOTIC GUMMIES
productOverview: Opti-Men Multivitamin + Probiotic Gummies is designed for active men who are looking for a performance oriented multivitamin with probiotic to support their healthy lifestyles1. The product offers dual benefit of Multi Vitamin + Probiotic in one serving, and includes essential vitamins and minerals that provide the body with key nutrients. Product is designed to support energy, metabolism, muscle health and immunity. With added probiotic for a balanced belly! One bottle includes 90 gummies, which is a 30 day supply. The product comes in assorted fruit flavors, including mixed berries and blood orange. Naturally flavored.
benefits: Includes 126% of your daily Vitamin C value (113mg) and for immune and antioxidant support!
With Zinc and Calcium
With Vitamin B6 and B12 for energy
17 essential nutrients including: Vitamin A, B6, B12, C, D, E, K, Folate, Biotin, Calcium, Choline, Iodine, Zinc, Selenium, Chromium and more!
Includes assorted fruit flavors
Naturally flavored
90 Count, 30 Day Supply
Gluten free
With probiotic support for a balanced belly!
vitamins02.suggestedUse: Consume 3 gummies daily. Naturally flavored. Chew completely before swallowing.

weightGainer01.name: GOLD STANDARD GAINER
productOverview: Protein & Carb Muscle Recovery Formula

GOLD STANDARD GAINER is built on a foundation of complete dairy proteins, mostly from isolate sources. The carbohydrate blend includes oat, pea and potato, and the fats include medium chain triglycerides, chia and flax. We took it a step further by making the powder easy to mix in a shaker cup. No blender needed. This is the new Gold Standard for weight gain support.
benefits: 750-770 Calories Per Serving
55 Grams of Protein Per Serving
109-116 Grams of Carbohydrates Per Serving
Complete Protein from Primarily Isolate Sources
Carbohydrates from Oat, Pea & Potato
Fats From Flax, Chia & MCTs
weightGainer01.suggestedUse: Mix 2 scoops of the powder into 20 fluid ounces of cold water or milk using a shaker cup post-workout and/or between meals to add calories, carbs and protein to your healthy, balanced diet.

weightGainer02.name: SERIOUS MASS
productOverview: For Muscle Building & Weight Gain Goals

SERIOUS MASS is the ultimate muscle building and weight gain formula. With 1,250 calories per 2-scoop serving and 50 grams of protein to support muscle recovery, this powder makes the ideal post-workout and between meals shake for sizing up your goals. SERIOUS MASS provides you with the tools you need to support your weight gains goals.
benefits: High-Calorie Formula Supports Muscle Building³ and Weight Gain Goals
1,250 Calories per Serving to Help Boost Calorie Intake
50 Grams of Protein per Serving to Help Build and Maintain Muscle
252-254 Grams of Carbohydrates per Serving to Help Fuel Workouts
3 Grams of Creatine Monohydrate per Serving
25 Vitamins & Essential Minerals
weightGainer02.suggestedUse: Mix 2 scoops of the powder into 24 fluid ounces of cold water or milk using an electric blender. This allows to you add in fruits, peanut butter and other calorie-contributing foods. TIP: New users should start with a 1-scoop half serving. Use post-workout and/or between meals to add calories, carbs and protein to your healthy, balanced diet.

weightGainer03.name: PRO GAINER
productOverview: High-Protein Weight Gainer

Putting on size requires a balance of heavy training, adequate rest and quality nutrition. Because everyone's a little different, some have a harder time packing on muscle than others. PRO GAINER is a high-protein formula delivering calories that count during recovery. Each shake provides ample supplemental protein, carbs, vitamins and minerals to build on the amount you're getting through a balanced diet of food.
benefits: 60 Grams of Protein Per Serving
85 Grams of Carbohydrates Per Serving
650 Calories Per Serving
60:85 Protein To Carb Ratio
No more than 4 Grams of Added Sugars
weightGainer03.suggestedUse: Just add one heaping scoop of Pro Complex Gainer to 16 fluid ounces of water, milk or your favorite beverage in a shaker cup. Then shake until thoroughly mixed. Use in combination with a healthy, balanced diet and exercise program.
